title: Is Gal Gadot the right actress to play Wonder Woman?

og.title: Is Gal Gadot the right actress to play Wonder Woman?
og.description:
Answer (1 of 97): In hindsight, yes.

I had my doubts, oh believe me, I did. The problem with Gal Gadot, is that she doesn’t really look like Wonder Woman.

The classic Wonder Woman look is All-American. She has bright blue eyes and the sharp, chiseled-features that were regarded as ideal in Cauc...
